Gifts.title: Blush Bloom Luxury Gift Box
Gifts.description: Make her feel extra special this Mother's Day with the Blush Bloom Luxury Gift Box. Elegantly wrapped in soft pastel tones with a graceful pink ribbon and floral accents, this gift box is perfect for presenting heartfelt surprises.

Gifts.title: “Mom” Ceramic Mug with Floral Charm
Gifts.description: Celebrate her warmth with this elegant “Mom” Ceramic Mug, designed in a lovely blush tone and floral aesthetic. Ideal for her morning coffee or evening tea, it’s more than a mug—it’s a daily reminder of your love. A thoughtful and practical Mother's Day gift that she'll cherish with every sip.

Gifts.title: “Best Mom Ever” Floral Canvas Tote Bag
Gifts.description: Surprise your mom with this charming canvas tote bag, featuring a heartfelt “Best Mom Ever” message in a floral design. Spacious and durable, it’s perfect for daily errands, weekend getaways, or simply showing off her supermom status. A trendy, meaningful, and practical Mother’s Day gift she'll love to carry!

Gifts.title: Cozy “Mama” Heart Hoodie – Soft & Stylish Gift for Mom
Gifts.description: Celebrate your mom’s love and warmth with this ultra-soft “Mama” hoodie, accented with a delicate heart print. Ideal for lounging, casual outings, or cool evening walks, it’s a thoughtful and cozy gift that wraps her in comfort while reminding her how loved she is. A perfect pick for Mother's Day!

Gifts.title: Elegant Gold Micropavé Ring – Timeless Sparkle for Mom
Gifts.description: Let your love shine with this beautifully crafted micropavé gold ring, designed for elegance and simplicity. Its shimmering details and refined shape make it a sophisticated accessory for daily wear or special occasions. A graceful token of appreciation for the queen of your heart—your mom.

Gifts.title: Princess-Cut White Gold Promise Ring for Mom
Gifts.description: Gift your mom a symbol of love and gratitude with this white gold-plated princess-cut ring. Its sparkling centerpiece and graceful setting embody elegance and warmth. A meaningful piece that adds timeless charm—perfect for celebrating the queen she is this Mother's Day.

Gifts.title: Rustic “Mom” Keepsake Gift Set with Candle & Card
Gifts.description: Celebrate your mom’s warmth with this charming rustic-style gift set. Featuring a handcrafted “Mom” wooden decor piece, a soothing scented candle, and a loving message card—this cozy combo is a beautiful way to say “I appreciate you” on Mother's Day.

Gifts.title: Luxury Floral Spa Gift Box for Mom
Gifts.description: Pamper your mom with this elegant floral-themed spa gift box, complete with fragrant bath essentials, a stylish mug, and delicate flower accents. It’s a luxurious way to give her the relaxation and appreciation she truly deserves on Mother’s Day.

Gifts.title: Sweet Pink Delight Gift Set for Mom
Gifts.description: Treat your mom to a charming surprise with this pink-inspired gift box, filled with delightful chocolates, fresh roses, and pampering treats. It’s the perfect way to show your love and gratitude with a touch of sweetness and elegance.

Gifts.title: I Love You Mom – Keepsake Photo Frame Gift
Gifts.description: Capture your heartfelt message with this elegant photo frame gift that says it all — “I Love You Mom.” A timeless keepsake paired with a delicate bouquet to make your mother feel truly special and cherished.

Gifts.title: Cozy Mother’s Day Gift Box – Mug, Candle & Self-Care Set
Gifts.description: Treat your mom to a moment of peace with this beautifully curated gift box, featuring a warm ceramic mug, soothing candle, and self-care essentials. Perfect for moms who deserve a little pampering and love in a box.

Gifts.title: Sweet Moments Gift Basket for Mom
Gifts.description: Surprise your mom with this adorable basket of joy, featuring a soft teddy, fresh blooms, and delicious treats. A perfect blend of love and sweetness for Mother’s Day.

Gifts.title: Personalized Memory Box for Mom
Gifts.description: Celebrate Mother’s Day with a heartfelt touch. This custom gift set includes a photo frame, beautiful flowers, and love-filled notes — capturing memories that last forever.

Gifts.title: Best Mom Ever Floral Gift Box
Gifts.description: Treat your mom like royalty with this elegant floral gift box. Complete with pink roses, a heartfelt mug, and sweet indulgences, it’s the perfect way to say “I love you, Mom.”

Gifts.title: Cozy Love Box for Mom
Gifts.description: Wrap your mom in comfort with this cozy gift box featuring a soft pink mug, warm fuzzy socks, and a loving message. Perfect for moments of relaxation and showing how much she means to you.

Gifts.title: Elegant Pink & Gold Gift Set for Mom
Gifts.description: Celebrate your mom with this chic and graceful gift box that includes a classy mug, soothing candle, and delicate beauty essentials. A perfect pick to pamper the queen of your heart in style.

Gifts.title: Floral Bliss Gift Box for Mom
Gifts.description: Brighten your mom’s day with this beautifully curated floral-themed gift box. Complete with a cozy mug, relaxing candle, stylish scrunchie, and luxurious self-care items, it’s a gentle reminder of your love and appreciation.

Gifts.title: Pamper Her Pretty – Mother’s Day Glow Box
Gifts.description: Surprise your mom with a colorful box full of love and self-care! Featuring premium skincare goodies, a charming pink mug, floral accents, and more — this set is made to make her feel like the queen she is.
